g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_1280221b-484c-4141-a9e1-77131ae8cdf0
g.text: 157 [when: not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy")ansible_os_family == "RedHat" and not rhelaidedb.stat.exists]

g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_1103b6bf-98ee-4baf-b1c9-8031a7eea17b
g.text: 159 [when: not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy")ansible_os_family == "RedHat" and not rhelaidedbnew.stat.exists]

g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_f0848bc4-f9b2-44a4-8e1e-0eb9f4e8630e
g.text: 160 [when: not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy")ansible_os_family == "Debian" and not ubuaidedb.stat.exists]
